text: Bravo! is a Brazilian telenovela produced and broadcast by Rede Globo. It premiered on 16 June 1975 and ended on 30 January 1976, with a total of 179 episodes. It's the sixteenth "novela das sete" to be aired at the timeslot. It is created by Janete Clair and Gilberto Braga, directed by Fábio Sabag with Reynaldo Boury. == Cast == {|class="wikitable sortable" |- style="background:#ccc;" ! Actor !!
